### transfer

```solidity
function transfer(
    address _token,
    address payable _referral,
    address[] _addresses,
    uint256[] _values
) external returns (bool)
```

| `_referral` | address payable |  |
| `_addresses` | address[] |  |
| `_values` | uint256[] |  |
